visaType: Visa Exemption (短期滞在 - Tanki Taizai) — Short-Term Stay up to 90 days

items.name: Valid Passport
items.description: Brazilian passport valid for duration of stay with blank pages
items.source: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan
items.personalizedDetail: Passport must be valid through at least April 22, 2026

items.name: Return or Onward Flight Ticket
items.description: Confirmed return flight booking or onward travel ticket
items.personalizedDetail: Return flight on or before April 22, 2026

items.name: Proof of Accommodation
items.description: Hotel bookings, hostel reservations, or letter from host for entire stay

items.name: Proof of Sufficient Financial Means
items.description: Bank statements or credit card statements showing funds for trip (~¥10,000-15,000/day)

items.name: Proof of Income or Employment
items.description: Employment letter, freelance income proof, or tax returns demonstrating regular income

items.name: Travel Itinerary / Trip Plan
items.description: Day-by-day itinerary or general travel plan

items.name: Travel Insurance
items.description: Travel medical insurance covering the duration of stay in Japan

items.name: Disembarkation Card (ED Card)
items.description: Completed upon arrival at Japanese port of entry — provided on flight or at immigration

items.name: Customs Declaration
items.description: Completed customs declaration form — provided on flight or at arrival hall

items.name: Visit Japan Web Registration
items.description: Complete online at vjw.digital.go.jp before arrival for faster immigration processing

processingTime: No processing — visa-exempt entry at border
applyAt: No advance application needed — present documents at port of entry
importantNotes: Brazil-Japan visa exemption agreement covers tourism stays up to 90 days
No visa required but immigration officer may request supporting documents at entry
Must not engage in paid employment or activities requiring a work visa
Visit Japan Web (vjw.digital.go.jp) can be completed online before arrival for faster processing

sources.name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan

applicationWindow.latest: Present documents at port of entry

commonRejectionReasons: Insufficient proof of funds for duration of stay
No confirmed return or onward flight booking
Unable to clearly state purpose of visit at immigration
Previous overstay or immigration violation in Japan

financialThresholds.notes: May be requested at port of entry; credit cards widely accepted but cash proof helps

alternativeVisaTypes.note: For ages 18-30, allows part-time work during stay (Brazil-Japan bilateral agreement)

postArrivalRegistration.deadline: within 14 days if staying at a private residence
postArrivalRegistration.where: Local municipal office (市区町村役場) — hotels register automatically
